document.full_text: venus williams will travel to germany with the u.s. fed cup team for their world group playoff later this month and could be available for duty if fit, american captain mary joe fernandez said on tuesday.
document.title: venus williams will travel to germany for fed cup
lines_and_colors: venus williams will travel to germany with the u.s. fed cup team for their world group playoff later this month and could be available for duty if fit, american captain mary joe fernandez said on tuesday.
